Histrion nared konec aprila, bazeni pa junija
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Sonja Ribolica

Hotel Histrion so v ponedeljek zapustili zadnji gostje, včeraj pa so že začeli prazniti sobe. Hoteli Bernardin namreč začenjajo drugi naložbeni ciklus - prenovili bodo hotel Histrion, bazenski del in center dobrega počutja. Prenova bo trajala skoraj do konca aprila oziroma junija, za naložbo pa bodo ...



Pešpot skozi kompleks se bo končala za oboki, naprej bo zapora zaradi gradbišča. Za tiste, ki bi želeli do glavne ceste, bo pot speljana po stopnicah (pred oboki), mimo cerkvice in naprej po zgornji strani kompleksa.  Foto: Sonja Ribolica

Histrion is due in late April and pools in June
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Sonja Ribolica

The last guests left the Histrion Hotel on Monday, and yesterday they had already begun to empty the rooms. The Bernardin Hotels are embarking on a second investment cycle - they will renovate the Histrion Hotel, the pool area and the wellness center. The renovation will take almost until the end of April or June, and the investment will ...



The footpath through the complex will end behind the vaults, and there will be further closures due to the construction site. For those who would like to reach the main road, the path will be taken down the stairs (before the vaults), past the church and further up the upper side of the complex. Photo by Sonja Ribolica
